description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Post function of VK Blocks 1.53.0.1 and earlier and VK Blocks Pro 1.53.0.1 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

product.name: VK Blocks and VK Blocks Pro

enisaIdProduct.product_version: VK Blocks 1.53.0.1 and earlier, and VK Blocks Pro 1.53.0.1 and earlier
